signUp.title: Let's get started
signUp.name: Name
signUp.termsText: By clicking continue, you agree to our

signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.termsText: By clicking continue, you agree to our

emptyState.title: No agents found
emptyState.description: Create an agent to join your meetings. Each agent will follow your instructions and can interact with participants during the call.

form.name: Name
form.instructionsPlaceholder: Eg. You are a math tutor. You are good at explaining math concepts.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: The following action will delete {meetingCount} associated meetings. This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.title: No meetings found
emptyState.description: Create a meeting to start a new call. Each meeting will have an agent that will follow your instructions and can interact with participants during the call.

form.name: Name
form.agentDescription: Not found the agent you want?

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: The following action will delete the meeting. This action cannot be undone.

cancelDialog.title: Are you sure?
cancelDialog.description: The following action will cancel the meeting. This action cannot be undone.

upcoming.title: No started yet
upcoming.description: Once you start this meeting, a summary will appear here.

active.title: Meeting in progress
active.description: The meeting is in progress. You can join the meeting to continue.

cancelled.title: Meeting cancelled
cancelled.description: The meeting was cancelled by the host.

processing.title: Meeting completed
processing.description: The meeting has been completed and is being processed. You can review the summary and download the transcript soon.

completed.title: Meeting completed
completed.description: The meeting has been completed and is being processed. You can review the summary and download the transcript soon.

completed.title: Meeting has ended
completed.description: The meeting has ended. You can not longer join the meeting.

lobby.title: Meeting: {meetingName}
lobby.description: Set up your call before joining
lobby.allowBrowserPermissions: Please grant your browser a permission to access your camera and microphone.

ended.title: Meeting: {meetingName}
ended.description: The meeting has ended. Summary will be available in few minutes.
